gameLogic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Game class of the Game. Handles all of the game logic.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int TOTAL_POINTS
      The score a player must reach to win the game.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GoalManager getGoalManager()

      Returns the main game instance.

      GameState getState() 
      void setState(GameState state)
      Sets the GameState of the Game.
      void subscribeObstacleChanged(ObstacleListener obstacleListener)
      This method adds a new ObstacleListener to the game, which is notified when an Obstacle starts or ends.
      void subscribeStateChanged(GameStateListener listener)
      Adds a listener for when the game state is changed.
